snippet.title: Nightmare House: Reimagined - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Nightmare House: Reimagined on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2744430/Nightmare_House_Reimagined?utm_source=Youtube&utm_campaign=WCS

And also Nightmare House: The Original Mod:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2954780/Nightmare_House_The_Original_Mod?utm_source=Youtube&utm_campaign=WCS

Welcome back to Nightmare House. Delve into an action-packed, first-person horror experience based on the legendary Half-Life 2 horror mod “Nightmare House 2”.  

No matter where you’re heading or what you’re doing, you can’t help but feel like you’re being watched. Equipped with your reliable axe, tread through the terrors of an abandoned house and desperately look for a way to break free from this nightmare. 
How long will it take you to realize that escape was never an option?

Mailing List: https://mailchi.mp/7bc21fb935fe/wcs-youtube-signup
Discord: https://discord.gg/wecreatestuff
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wecreatestuff
